intro.heading: What works in Hampshire (and what doesn't)
paragraphs: Hampshire has everything from busy city trade to destination pubs. The pubs that win make it easy to find them and easy to choose them.
We fix the basics first: Google profile, photos, reviews, and clear messaging for what you are known for.
Then we build one or two repeatable hooks and a content plan your team can run without living on social.

faqs.question: Will this help if we get tourist spikes?
faqs.answer: Yes. We build systems to turn spikes into repeats and make sure you show up for the searches visitors use.

faqs.question: Can you help with menus and upsells?
faqs.answer: Yes. Small menu and positioning changes can lift average spend without discounting.

faqs.question: How quickly can this work?
faqs.answer: You can usually see early movement in days (more calls, messages, and interest). Proper results build over 30 days with consistency.
